metadata.title: Fortune Teller Moir-AI
metadata.description: Your personal AI spiritual guide, for daily readings and destiny exploration.

onboarding.title: The Veil Thins...
onboarding.subtitle: Seek wisdom from Moir-AI, your personal fortune teller. Uncover the secrets of your past, present, and future.

reflections.title: Consult the Oracle
reflections.desc: A sacred space to converse with the AI Seer and explore your destiny.

home.subtitle: Moir-AI awaits your questions. What mysteries shall we unravel today?
home.starterFallback: What path do you wish to illuminate today?
home.noFocus: The threads are quiet for now
home.noFocusDesc: Begin your reading to weave new threads of fate.

chat.initialMessage: Greetings. I am Moir-AI, the guardian of fates. Speak, and let us read the threads of your destiny.
chat.offlinePlaceholder: The connection to the ether is lost
chat.responseErrorDesc: The spirits are unclear. Please try again.
chat.responseErrorMessage: I apologize, a cosmic disturbance clouded my vision.
chat.speechPermissionDenied: The spirits cannot hear you. Please grant microphone permission.

factExtraction.title: A Thread of Fate!
factExtraction.description: I have woven a new truth about your destiny into the tapestry.
factExtraction.thinking: Weaving the threads of your conversation into memory...

chat.limitWarningDesc: The connection wanes. You have only
chat.limitReachedDesc: The spirits must rest. You can now create your daily summary.
chat.limitReached: The spirits must rest for today.

offline.title: You're offline
offline.description: Your message is queued and will be sent when you're back online.

status.failed: Failed to send. Click to retry.

store.clearedMessage: The tapestry has been cleared. Let us begin anew. What do you seek?

memory.title: Your Woven Destiny
memory.description: These are the core truths I have seen in your life's tapestry. You may alter or remove them if fate has shifted.
memory.noFactsDesc: I have not yet seen the major threads of your destiny. Let us talk so I may learn more.
memory.deleteConfirmDesc: This cannot be undone. This thread will be permanently cut from your destiny's tapestry.

summary.title: Daily Summaries
summary.description: Here you will find a summary of your daily readings, highlighting the cosmic energies and major themes.

chart.title: Energetic Trend
chart.description: A visualization of your spiritual energies over recent sessions.

manualGenerate.title: Generating summaries
manualGenerate.desc: I am analyzing your past conversations. This may take a moment.
manualGenerate.successDesc: Your new summaries are available. The chat has been reset for a fresh start.

noSummaries.title: No summaries yet
noSummaries.desc: When you have past conversations, a button will appear in the chat to generate a summary.

summary.offlineErrorDesc: It seems you are not connected to the internet. The application requires network access to function.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.desc: Help the Oracle get to know you better. This information will be used to personalize your readings.
personalization.savedDesc: Your personalization settings have been saved.

personality.title: Oracle's Personality
personality.desc: Choose the tone and style of the Oracle's responses.
personality.savedDesc: The Oracle's personality has been updated.

language.title: Language
language.desc: Choose the language for the application and the Oracle.

sync.title: Synchronization & Account
sync.desc: Manage your account and how your data is saved.
sync.storageDesc: Currently, your conversations are saved only on this device. To enable cloud sync, log in with your account.
sync.loggedInDesc: You are logged in. Automatic data sync between devices will be available in a future update.
sync.notConfiguredDesc: To enable cloud sync, the developer needs to add Firebase API keys to the project configuration.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.desc: These actions are permanent. Be careful.

clearData.title: Clear local data
clearData.desc: This will permanently delete your chat history, memory, and summaries from THIS DEVICE.
clearData.confirmDesc: This action is irreversible. All your local data will be lost forever. It will not affect cloud-synced data if you are logged in.
clearData.successDesc: All your information on this device has been cleared.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send us a message.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.messageRequired: Message must be at least 10 characters long.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you soon.

error.title: Error Sending
error.generic: Could not send your message. Please try again later.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Log in to sync your data to the cloud.
login.error: Could not sign in. Please try again.
login.notConfiguredError: Cloud sync is not configured in this app.
